label: Tool Change Height
description: Safe Z height used for tool change. This is the home or predefined safe position and is not part of the drilling cycle.

label: Move Height
description: Z height used for rapid movements between holes. The tool always returns to this height before moving in X/Y.

label: Drill Offset
description: Relative Z offset applied from the move height to perform drilling. This value should be negative to define the drilling depth.

label: Drill Feed Rate
description: Feed rate used when moving down from the move height to the drilling depth.

label: Retract Feed Rate
description: Feed rate used when retracting the tool from the drilling depth back to the move height.

label: Generate File Per Tool
description: When enabled, a separate output file is generated for each tool instead of combining all tools into a single file.
